projects.title: Migration of UGW's to MPLS Core Network
projects.description:
Due to increased customer traffic and forecast of further increase of traffic we had to enhance the capapcity of UGW links with IP backbone before Migration we had 10G connection with IP Backbone/Transport Network and proposed was to enhance it to 40G for each UGW and also to Migrate 4 UGW's in KPN Network to new MPLS Core network .

My role was to review the design documents,ensure that the traffic is offloaded from the Node to be Migrated and is being handeled successfully by other UGW's  and then implement the solution . After Migration we had to ensure that all services are running successfully and that we ensure by rigorous service and connectivity testings.

After Migration we had to bring back traffic on the UGW and ensure that services are running fine after putting back live customer traffic .

projects.title: PS Core Swap project
projects.description:
Project Objective

To ensure network after swap is 3G compatible with respect to data services.
 Project Tasks
Commissioning of PS Core nodes
The PS Swap included  integration of Huawei USN, UGW, DNS and CG sever
Co-ordination with project teams – tracking and evaluating the project performance and generating reports to the management as this was the business critical project.
Taking official Handover from vendor after successful Acceptance Testing.
 Achievements
Sound understanding gained for PS Core network
Improvement in Packet Core KPI achieved as compared to the previous Pre swap design.

contributors.headline: Sr. Solution Engineer  at Nokia Software

profile_positions.description: I have  worked for KPN for 9 years and had different roles like Project Implementation Manager , Product Owner, Project Coordinator in Mobile Core Network domain . I have been involved in major projects like 4G rollout of KPN ,  4G Roaming Launch and various projects in Mobile Packet Switch , Network Security and IP Core Domain . In my last assignment I was involved in 5G Core deployment in KPN Network and was responsible for Security domain of UDM UDR .
profile_positions.title: Implementation Manager Mobile Core

profile_positions.description:
In this role I was involved in Planning , Execution , Implementation , Escalation and Coordination in a Large telecom network operations department. I was responsible for Operations, Optimization, Integration and Expansion , Incident and Process management for smooth and synchronous operation

Roles and Responsibilities:

-	Responsible for testing and quality control. Working with UAT team to create test cases
-	Managing technical support team (team of 7 full time employees) and Incident management team (4 Full time employees)
-	Manage the team’s daily activities (support and coordination of service requests and incident management, ensuring high availability for related IT services)
-	End-End support, coordination and control of assigned trouble tickets with root-cause analysis 
-	Evaluate the KPI’s (CSR, LU SR, PSR, CPU Utilization and Availability) through statistical tools and performing network optimization to improve performance for all CS Core systems
-	Responsible for several projects including rollouts and upgrades
-	Close coordination with Core Network Planning, Optimization and TAC-2 Teams to ensure smooth roll-out of new services & platforms to meet the capacity requirements.
-	People management (planning, monitoring, and appraising results, coaching, initiating, and enforcing systems, policies, and procedures)
-	Designing priority matrix to address issues as per priority
-	Responsible for designing escalation process, communication and coordination process with clients and internal stakeholders.
-	Planning and executing release schedules 
-	Ensuring successful and smooth release process
-	Leading and exploring business growth opportunities
-	Strategic and Relationship Management
profile_positions.title: Project Lead Implementation
